top.parak.kraft.core.support.file

类 RandomAccessFileAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.parak.kraft.core.support.file.RandomAccessFileAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SeekableFile

    public class RandomAccessFileAdapter
extends Object
implements SeekableFile
    SeekableFile implementation based on RandomAccessFile.
    从以下版本开始:
    2022-04-02
    作者:
    KHighness
